mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend_apply ( apply_user_id, handle_user_id, apply_time, handle_time, source, chat_list, apply_status, handle_status, is_black ) VALUES ( #{applyUserId}, #{handleUserId}, #{applyTime}, #{handleTime}, #{source}, #{chatList}, #{applyStatus}, #{handleStatus}, #{isBlack} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM friend_apply WHERE apply_user_id = #{applyUserId} AND handle_user_id = #{handleUserId}

SELECT lu.account AS account, lu.user_name AS userName, lu.phone AS phone, lu.avatar_url AS avatarUri, -- 使用 avatar_url IFNULL(fa.apply_time, 0) AS applyTime, -- 申请时间 IFNULL(fa.handle_time, NULL) AS handleTime, -- 处理时间 IFNULL(fa.source, 0) AS source, -- 申请来源 IFNULL(fa.chat_list, '{}') AS chatList, -- 聊天列表，默认返回空 JSON IFNULL(fa.apply_status, 0) AS applyStatus, -- 申请状态 IFNULL(fa.handle_status, 0) AS handleStatus, -- 处理状态 IFNULL(fa.is_black, 0) AS isBlack -- 是否拉黑，0 表示 FALSE FROM login_user lu LEFT JOIN friend_apply fa ON lu.id = fa.handle_user_id -- 连接条件 WHERE lu.account LIKE CONCAT('%', #{handlerAccount}, '%') -- 模糊匹配 handlerAccount AND (fa.apply_user_id = ( SELECT id FROM login_user WHERE account = #{applyAccount} -- 精确匹配 applyAccount ) OR fa.apply_user_id IS NULL) -- 包含没有申请用户的情况

SELECT lh.user_name AS userName, -- 用户名称 lh.phone AS applyPhone, -- 申请人的电话 lh.avatar_url AS avatarUrl, -- 申请人的头像 URL lu.account AS applyAccount, -- 申请人的账号 lh.account AS userAccount, -- 处理人的账号 lh.account AS handlerAccount, -- 处理人的账号 IFNULL(fa.apply_time, 0) AS applyTime, -- 申请时间 IFNULL(fa.handle_time, NULL) AS handleTime, -- 处理时间 IFNULL(fa.source, 0) AS addSource, -- 申请来源 IFNULL(fa.chat_list, '[]') AS chatList, -- 聊天列表，默认返回空 JSON List IFNULL(fa.apply_status, 0) AS applyStatus, -- 申请状态 IFNULL(fa.handle_status, 0) AS handleStatus, -- 处理状态 IFNULL(fa.is_black, 0) AS isBlack, -- 是否拉黑，0 表示 FALSE CASE WHEN fa.apply_user_id = #{applyUserId} THEN true ELSE false END AS isAddMeNotResponse -- 判断是否是添加我的请求 FROM login_user lu LEFT JOIN friend_apply fa ON lu.id = fa.apply_user_id -- 连接条件 LEFT JOIN login_user lh ON fa.handle_user_id = lh.id -- 连接处理人的账号 WHERE fa.apply_user_id = #{applyUserId} -- 精确匹配 applyUserId

SELECT la.user_name AS userName, -- 用户名称 la.phone AS handlerPhone, -- 处理人的电话 la.avatar_url AS avatarUrl, -- 处理人的头像 URL lu.account AS handlerAccount, -- 处理人的账号 la.account AS userAccount, -- 处理人的账号 la.account AS applyAccount, -- 申请者账号 IFNULL(fa.apply_time, 0) AS applyTime, -- 申请时间，转换为时间戳 IFNULL(fa.handle_time, NULL) AS handleTime, -- 处理时间，转换为时间戳 IFNULL(fa.source, 0) AS addSource, -- 申请来源，映射到 addSource IFNULL(fa.chat_list, '[]') AS chatList, -- 聊天列表，默认返回空 JSON List IFNULL(fa.apply_status, 0) AS applyStatus, -- 申请状态 IFNULL(fa.handle_status, 0) AS handleStatus, -- 处理状态 IFNULL(fa.is_black, 0) AS isBlack, -- 是否拉黑，0 表示 FALSE CASE WHEN fa.handle_user_id = #{handleUserId} THEN true ELSE false END AS isAddMeNotResponse -- 判断是否是添加我的请求 FROM login_user lu LEFT JOIN friend_apply fa ON lu.id = fa.handle_user_id -- 连接条件 LEFT JOIN login_user la ON fa.apply_user_id = la.id -- 连接申请者账号 WHERE fa.handle_user_id = #{handleUserId} -- 精确匹配 handlerId
